title: Bible Black New Testament Restored (censored)
description:
This is the Restored / Complete version of Bible Black : New Testament. 

For those of you who may not know, Milky Studios (who made the series) released a "Restored" version of Bible Black New Testament : basically, they made a 2-hour movie by adding all the episodes, cutting about one hour of scenes and added about 7 minutes of new scenes. 

Since it's only been released in Japan, there hasn't been any translation or subtitles and it's still censored. This version is the only one I have managed to find and I wanted to share it.



Video : 640 * 480
Audio : Japanese
